Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Zoom above some of America's greatest landcapes and monuments in stunning HD realism.

Clip.Title: STRANDED: ALPINE CRASH
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In November 19, 1946, a U.S. military transport plane goes out of control while flying over the Swiss Alps and crashes high in the mountains. Miraculously, all 12 passengers and crew survive the accident, but their safety is anything but assured. The aircraft has flown miles off course, and its position is unknown. Food supplies are low, the temperature is dropping, and their radio battery is running out of juice. Time is quickly running out. The fate of the survivors will depend on one man, one plane, and one inspired idea.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of New Brunswick is an ecological wonder- this aerial survey soars above incredible rock formations, peat farms, and some of the East Coast's most impressive sand dunes.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the port city of Halifax, to the historic Acadian shores and international waters beyond, this aerial exploration documents the treasures and mysteries of Nova Scotia's Southern coast.

Miraculously, all 12 passengers and crew survive the accident, but their safety is anything but assured. The aircraft has flown miles off course, and its position is unknown. Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travel on the most beautiful train rides and make fascinating encounters at different stops along the way.

Clip.Title: CORSICA: THE PEARL OF THE MEDITERRANEAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This series takes us on a journey to discover the island's history, its culture and its proud people.

Clip.Title: ALBINO UNITED
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Albino United football team was created as a way to bring albino people together with the rest of Tanzania. Meet the members of the team and learn about the ongoing problems facing albinos in this part of the world.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Technology is advancing at a geometric rate. Find out how far we have come and how far our minds are going to innovate.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Find out why some inquiring minds believe that the world is headed for ruin within the next century.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: The Flame and Cross: The South Caucasus
Clip.EpisodeSummary: 25 years after first filming the route, the original film crew returns to the region for a modern look.

Clip.Title: JEFFERSON'S SECRET BIBLE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Experts at Smithsonian Institution's National Museum of American History are trying 200 years later, to preserve Jefferson's secret bible, a book he constructed by cutting apart the New Testament to tell a chronological story of Jesus's life, parables, and moral instruction, removing all mention of miracles and the resurrection.

Clip.Title: SHACKLETON'S FROZEN HELL
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In 1914, the world's first trans-Antarctic expedition came to a cold stop. Trapped in ice just 60 miles from their destination, explorer Ernest Shackleton and his crew found themselves in a dire situation that would play out as a two-year battle against starvation, sub-zero conditions, and the threat of being swallowed by the unforgiving Southern Ocean.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: The Flame and Cross: The South Caucasus
Clip.EpisodeSummary: 25 years after first filming the route, the original film crew returns to the region for a modern look.
